itunes:title: Listen To This When You're Heart Broken
title: Listen To This When You're Heart Broken
itunes:author: Joey Kidney
itunes:subtitle: Welcome back to the Happy Times podcast! Today we…
itunes:summary:
Welcome back to the Happy Times podcast! Today we are talking about heart breaks and my 5 steps to dealing with them and understanding how to feel in these situations. These are my personal opinions from my personal experiences so please understand it may not work for everyone. 

We also had 'The Voice' guest Anthony Ortiz on to sing a cover of You & Me by Lifehouse! 

BetterHelp: http://tryonlinetherapy.com/joeykidney

Support this podcast at — https://redcircle.com/the-happy-times/exclusive-content

Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands

content:encoded:
Welcome back to the Happy Times podcast! Today we are talking about heart breaks and my 5 steps to dealing with them and understanding how to feel in these situations. These are my personal opinions from my personal experiences so please understand it may not work for everyone. We also had 'The Voice' guest Anthony Ortiz on to sing a cover of You & Me by Lifehouse! BetterHelp: http://tryonlinetherapy.com/joeykidney
